title: Cartoon on World War I - support

content.prompt: Which of the following groups would have been most likely to support the ideas expressed in the image?

choices.label: Isolationists and opponents of the First World War
African American migrants to northern cities
Managers and owners of business enterprises
Radical labor movements such as the Industrial Workers of the World

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
